entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
